event_name: Funding the Commons x Earth Commons x APAC DAO
description:
Join us for our 11th Funding the Commons conference in Bangkok in November 2024!


​We will explore three focal areas:  

  

​- The evolution of innovation in digital public goods and open web funding, with a focus on impact evaluation and related challenges. 

- ​Local and regional approaches in Southeast Asia (SEA) concerning commons-in-practice and public goods. 

- Stewardship of natural resources, highlighting the intersection of decentralized science (DeSci) with Earth Commons, and exploring regenerative practices, biodiversity, and climate action.

sessions.name: Opening Words
